Reviews.Title: Great laptop for a very resonable price!
Reviews.Author: Sanqing Yuan "yuan9773"
Reviews.Content: This Toshiba is an excellent budget priced Laptop with the basic features most people need. Equipped with 4th generation platform, it is faster than expected, plays games or everyday work. Recommended!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Benjamin J.
Reviews.Content: This has been a great laptop so far. Easy to set up. Came with 8.1 so didn't have to upgrade. With a 4th gen i3 and 6g of RAM, it responds very well. Liked having the 750g hard drive. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Very nice computer
Reviews.Author: Ken Aries "airball"
Reviews.Content: What a great deal anytime you can get a high quality lap top for $400.  It arrived on time, in great condition and was very easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Christian De Freitas
Reviews.Content: I've been on a lookout  for a laptop and decided i wanted a core i3 M series laptop, please lookout when you buy a laptop that the U series core i3 processors are energy efficient, but the M series are performance.you want an U series if you need the battery to last long, the M series if you want a little more from your laptop.so the core i5 "u series" acer like this one, http://amzn.to/Qtamrm is as powerfull as this one.excellent buybtw if you want to know wich series you have, look at the processor number, this one is core i3 4000m, the core i5 u series is 4020u. the last digit in the number.other note, i was also looking at this laptop, its core i3 4th gen but u series, it has the advantage that its touchscreen, http://amzn.to/1l8Xpi5

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Ronda
Reviews.Content: Love it  This was a gift to my daughter and family.  Love skyping with my grandchildren  I know she is enjoying it

Reviews.Title: I regret buying this laptop
Reviews.Author: Joanna
Reviews.Content: It keeps freezing up on me. The sound quality sucks :( and the volume keeps doing weird things like going mute and so I have to restart it for the audio to work. It's a good laptop if you want to use it for basic things like using the Internet. I myself wanted to use it for photo and video editing but it doesn't seem to be very useful for that sort of  thing.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Gallagher
Reviews.Content: Perhaps I should start by saying that every laptop I've ever owned has been a Toshiba, so I'm not exactly well-versed in the merits, or lack thereof, of the competition. I liked the first one I owned and it served me well, so I decided to stick with a winner.This latest version has not disappointed me. Even the dreaded Windows 8 hasn't been a big problem for me. I must, however, agree with the other reviewers who have said that the audio sucks. I didn't think I would care about that, but then I tried to use it to watch TV, and discovered that it really can be annoying. And external speakers aren't really a good option for a computer that's supposed to be portable. I haven't tried using headphones or ear buds. Maybe that would be a viable solution.To sum up, the C55-A5182 is a good, solid machine for the kind of work I do (mostly writing), so overall I'm quite happy with it. It's sleek and beautiful and fast. Just don't try to listen to music or watch a movie.

Reviews.Title: A GREAT LAPTOP
Reviews.Author: CAROLYN T. TAYLOR
Reviews.Content: This Toshiba laptop is great!  I love it and use it for several hours every day.I have had no trouble with it at all.

Reviews.Title: it's okay
Reviews.Author: Gary Cannon
Reviews.Content: i've been on a learning curve for how to use the keypad.  it doesn't have buttons but has these two lines and it takes quite a bit more pressure to press them them for left and right clicks.  but its easier to tap and scroll once you get the hang of using two fingers.  sometimes the screen gets larger and smaller but its all getting use to how it operates.  i was disappointed that it didn't have backlit keys, but that was my error in not noticing.  overall, its okay and i will probably give it higher ratings as i get use to how to function in the windows 8 universe.

Reviews.Title: Nice Laptop
Reviews.Author: D.Ferrari
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop for my girlfriend.  She is not very techie so I have used it much more than her.  It works great.  It's fast, but not super fast and it has plenty of memory and a large hard drive.  It feels well made.  It is solid and the keyboard and display look and feel sturdy. It's a nice laptop.

Reviews.Title: My last Toshiba(Satellite L755)was great, this one sucks!
Reviews.Author: D. Choike Jr.
Reviews.Content: It's hard for me to write this review because I really liked my last Toshiba laptop a L755 w/pentium b chip. It's hard drive died  and I lost windows 7 and all my data, This is MY FAULT though because it warned me and I tried to see how long it would last kind of like Kramer on Seinfeld trying to see how far he could go past E on his gas gauge. Make sure you make your back up and recovery discs folks 'cause now I have to pay $30s/h which is OUTRAGEOUS to Toshiba for new ones.So being the type of guy who likes the opportunity to upgrade on the cheap I figured I'd just get a new upgraded laptop last week  and sell the old one after I fixed it since I would be starting from scratch on the old one anyway, BAD IDEA.1. WINDOWS 8 BLOWS CHUNKS. I even went to classicshell.net for a change to a similar interface but it's still pretty bad.2.This thing is FULL OF ADWARE and other POPUPS which cant' be removed w/out reinstalling windows. I'm running the same adblockers and as my old unit on Firefox and they hardly make a dent.3. It's SLOW??!! I'm only running Skype and Firefox w/a few tabs and it getting really hot and slowing down, That's "B A N A N A S" to quote a favorite song...C'mon Really?4. The quality of this unit is really cheap, flimsy and plasticity compared to my last satellite.  The old one was like a Plymouth Satellite which is to say very practical and built like a tank.( I've owned a few and own a 68 wagon at present btw...SWEET)5. Last but not least THE SOUND QUALITY IS HORRIBLE even with headphones or external speakers. Skype is almost unusable and I have used it on various PCs and it always sounds the same, not so on this lemon. I tried everything I could think of or find in reviews and forums and nothing helped, Toshiba's own forum is full of complaints too about the sound.I just got off the phone with Toshiba tech support and they offered no fixes and just told me to return it to the store. WTF kind of tech support is that? They must know there is a problem and seem to have just given up I guess, that's pretty weak if you ask me. I mean even HP offered me a different model back in the day but that's a whole other can of worms...no HPs for me ever.Well I guess I will fix my old 755 w/a solid state drive to speed it up a bit and just look at other brands. I MIGHT look at Toshibas in the future but I will damn well take a close look especially the sound.

Reviews.Title: yucky sound
Reviews.Author: Kay Rodrigues
Reviews.Content: This seems like a pretty good laptop, but it has the tinniest sound system I've ever dealt with on a computere. Setting up external speakers helps somewhat. Since I stream a lot of films from Amazon and etflix, sound is important to me.

Reviews.Title: What you pay for the computer is just the beginning.
Reviews.Author: Florence Lehman
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend this computer to anyone.  Almost everything has a fee attached.  Want to store something-cost you.  Want to do word processing?  costs you.  There is nothing I like about this computer.  I will have to buy a used one that has word on it and I sure won't buy another Toshiba.  This is the third one and NO MORE!

Reviews.Title: Easy to get started
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: This laptop has the processor that I was looking for...  It is a little slow booting up but is great once you update to 'windows 8.1 update'.  The product info section said it was 'Operating System :  Windows 8.1 Pro' however it only shipped with the core operating system windows 8.1.  This was a little disappointing since I wanted some of the enterprise features that 'Pro' offers.

Reviews.Title: Great computer
Reviews.Author: K. Crownover "K Crownover"
Reviews.Content: I love Toshiba laptops and wanted to stick with another Toshiba laptop because I have purchased extra power cords for my present one and wanted to be able to continue to use them.  I love the larger keys and the calculator keys on the right of the keyboard are a must for me.  The portability is good as well.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba C55-A5182 16-Inch Laptop
Reviews.Author: J. Angus
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a replacement for my Toshiba 10" tablet, I previously had a 19" Toshiba computer I had bought for myself but found I to heavy and bulky to carry around so I gave that to my grandson. so far I really like this laptop, it seems to have everything I was looking for and the price is very good I have only been using this for a couple of weeks but so far I am happy with this.

Reviews.Title: Great LapTop
Reviews.Author: S&L; Artz
Reviews.Content: We are pleased with this Laptop. It is very fast and is all that the reviews state! The only glitch that keeps it from 5 star is it has a noise when you are pushing the touch key, not sure if this is normal or just ours. You won't be disappointed

Reviews.Title: I am using it right now, good laptop
Reviews.Author: MamaSun knows best "Even a blind man knows wh...
Reviews.Content: This is a good laptop. I like it, it's quiet, the keyboard feels good. It comes with Windows 8.1 this I hear is better then straight up 8. Im getting used to the operating system. It does seem to drop internet a bit-- I don't quite understand why that is. The processor is fast.  Feels a little cheap- don't know if that is the black encasing fooling me rather then the silver I have been used to

Reviews.Title: Windows 8 not user friendly
Reviews.Author: Danny Corter
Reviews.Content: Do not like windows 8, is very hard to navigate  and not made to be user friendly. Definitely a step back.

Reviews.Title: What you need
Reviews.Author: Alex Hartley
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty basic computer, that does not come with Word. Nevertheless, for the money, it's hard to beat it. To answer some other reviews, the sound settings can be adjusted, and while the internal speakers aren't great, that's what headphones/external speakers are for.

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: Karla Reina
Reviews.Content: Is perfect!  Arrive in perfect conditions, I'm really happy with my new pc :) recomended 100%  is a good choice.

Reviews.Title: Awesome.
Reviews.Author: Savanna
Reviews.Content: Love it. I had to buy a new computer because my old one was officially gone. The shipping was super fast and mind you, I had got the standard. Ordered on a Friday recieved on a Monday. Great job.The computer is great. Windows 8 took me a little bit to get use to but I love it.Only thing I dislike about the computer it's self is it doesn't warn me when it's a low battery. Sometimes it does by 10%  popping up on the screeb but majority of the time it doesn't. I'm not sure why that is. Other than that, I am a satisfied customer.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Luis A. Sarco B
Reviews.Content: It's good for the price. The only thing that I'm worried about is that the case does not seem strong enough.It was shipped very fast and well protected.The only think

Intel Core™ i3-4000M Processor, Mobile Intel HD Graphics, Windows 8.1
16 widescreen, 1366x768 HD, 16:9 aspect ratio, Supports 720p content, HD TruBrite LED Backlit display
6GB DDR3L 1600MHz memory expandable utpo 16 GB, Memory Card Reader
750GB 5400rpm, Serial ATA, DVD-SuperMulti drive
HD Webcam and Microphone, Wi-Fi Wireless networking 802.11b/g/n, HDMI output port, 1-USB 3.0 port, 2-USB 2.0 ports
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba C55-A5182 16-Inch Laptop (2.4 GHz Intel i3 4000M Processor, 6GB RAM, 750GB Hard Drive, SuperMulti DVD Drive, Windows 8.1)
